imdb.plot outline: The EpicQuest television series is a character and location driven docudrama anchored by the adventure travel company EpicQuest. The story driven series will follow the guides, athletes and operational heads of the company as they work their way through a season of guiding, hosting and fulfilling the lifelong dreams of clients.
imdb.title: EpicQuest
plot: The _EpicQuest_ (qv) television series is a character and location driven docudrama anchored by the adventure travel company _EpicQuest_ (qv). The story driven series will follow the guides, athletes and operational heads of the company as they work their way through a season of guiding, hosting and fulfilling the lifelong dreams of clients.::Anonymous
